description: Observations to the London Borough of Hackney in connection with proposed erection of a 10 storey building to provide 890 sq.m. of Class A1 (retail), A3 (restaurant) floor space on ground floor and 31930 sq.m. of Class B1 (offices) on part ground floor and upper floors with associated car parking (27 spaces), plant room, servicing and landscaping together with the demolition of the existing buildings on site.
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE:  No further Observations.  

Reference is made to this Council's previous comments dated 5/12/03, which are reproduced below.

This Council wishes to raise no objections to the proposed land uses or the redevelopment of the existing building, but is concerned about the height and mass of the proposal when viewed from Chiswell Street and Finsbury Square, which would undermine the setting and scale of the square.
